channel.title: 经济学人
channel.description: 这是一个追踪经济学人news的种子

item.title:
秘密大会 "理论认为，只要没有人大惊小怪，就能成功达成妥协。
在此，我们（静静地）为众议院以压倒性优势通过的相当不错的税收协议鼓掌👇。
item.description:
The “secret congress” theory holds that a successful compromise can happen as long as no one makes a fuss over it.

Here we (quietly) applaud the rather good tax deal that the House of Representatives passed by an overwhelming margin econ.st/3OD1AqE 👇

item.title: 知道 "专项拨款 "和 "猪肉桶支出 "的区别吗？(这是一个技巧问题。）通过这些有用的解释来了解美国政治 🇺🇸
item.description: Know the difference between “earmarks” and “pork-barrel spending”? (That’s a trick question.) Brush up on American politics with these helpful explanations econ.st/42xpEks 🇺🇸

item.title: 今晚想看点什么？试试这些节目 👇
item.description: Looking for something to watch tonight? Try some of these shows econ.st/3w2zjn4 👇

item.title:
就在美国标准普尔 500 指数屡创新高之际，中国和香港市场仅在 1 月份就下跌了 150 亿美元。
要重新赢得投资者的信任，就必须重新思考国家在经济中的作用。但习近平不太可能放松他的控制 👇
item.description:
Even as America’s S&P 500 index reached record highs, markets in China and Hong Kong shed $1.5trn in January alone.

Regaining investors’ trust requires a rethink of the state’s role in the economy. But Xi Jinping is unlikely to soften his grip econ.st/49j6d18 👇

item.title: 从 2008 年到 2022 年，美国各州总检察长的竞选成本提高了 12 倍。这种现金流反映了这些顶级律师对全国政治和政策的影响力👇。
item.description: Between 2008 and 2022 the cost of state attorney-general races in America became 12 times pricier. This cashflow reflects the power that these top lawyers have over nationwide politics and policy econ.st/42yUCst 👇

item.title:
美国与伊朗的影子战争会升级吗？制衡 "栏目：
前美国中央司令部司令弗兰克-麦肯齐将军 美国上次攻击伊朗领土的情况 @AntonLaGuardia 从中东发回的报道
item.description:
Could America’s shadow war with Iran escalate? On “Checks and Balance”: econ.st/3OEFPXt

🎧 General Frank McKenzie, former commander of US Central Command
🎧 The last time America attacked Iranian territory
🎧 @AntonLaGuardia reports from the Middle East

item.title: 如何判断全球变暖已超过 1.5°C？我们用四张图表来解释👇。
item.description: How can you tell when the world has passed 1.5°C of global warming? We explain in four charts econ.st/499BcNs 👇

item.title: 自美国最高法院推翻 "罗伊诉韦德 "案、终止联邦宪法规定的堕胎权以来，已有七个州就这一问题举行了投票倡议。佛罗里达州可能是下一个发起倡议的州之一。
item.description: Since America’s Supreme Court overturned Roe v Wade and ended a federal constitutional right to abortion, seven states have held ballot initiatives on the issue. Florida may be among the next econ.st/3Uxe7j9 👇

item.title: 本周，评级机构穆迪将纽约社区银行降级为垃圾级。这对更广泛的银行系统有何启示？ 👇
item.description: This week Moody’s, a rating agency, downgraded New York Community Bancorp to junk status. What does this tell observers about the broader banking system? econ.st/4bvfAww 👇

item.title:
普京接受了塔克-卡尔森的采访。不过，仔细观察就会发现，这篇访谈提供了很有价值的见解，尽管这可能不是两位参与者想要表达的观点：
插图：KAL
item.description:
It is hard to blame anyone for skipping Vladimir Putin’s interview with Tucker Carlson. Watch closely, though, and it offers valuable insights, if probably not the kind either participant intended: econ.st/3SztGUX

Illustration: KAL

item.title: 乌克兰面临常规火炮严重短缺的问题，第一人称视角无人机可以帮助弥补火力缺口。无人机行动敏捷，能实时向操作员传回图像。这让它们可以施展火炮无法施展的绝技 👇。
item.description: With Ukraine facing a major shortage of conventional artillery, First Person View drones can help close the firepower gap. Drones are agile and relay pictures back to their operators in real-time. That lets them perform tricks that artillery cannot econ.st/4bjQ7Ge 👇

item.title: 世事变迁 👇
item.description: Things have changed econ.st/3urFbpw 👇

item.title: 巴基斯坦被操纵的选举充满了混乱。尽管该国的将军们竭尽全力，但他们的控制力似乎远不如他们想象的那样👇。
item.description: Pakistan’s rigged election was filled with confusion. Despite their strenuous efforts, the country’s generals appear much less in control than they thought econ.st/3T31Cel 👇

item.title: KAL 的漫画
item.description: KAL’s cartoon econ.st/49pLF7d

item.title: 调查数据显示，中国约 50% 的财富掌握在仅占总人口 8% 的人手中。这个群体对金融市场的影响力甚至比其财富所显示的还要大👇。
item.description: Survey data suggest that about 50% of China’s wealth is in the hands of just 8% of the population. This cohort has even more influence over financial markets than its wealth would suggest econ.st/42BizPO 👇

item.title:
参议院以向乌克兰提供援助为交换条件的边境安全法案的生命可谓凄惨而短暂。谈判人员于周日公布了法案文本，但到周二时，该法案已胎死腹中。
这在很大程度上说明了国会政治的毒辣 👇。
item.description:
The life of the Senate’s border-security bill in exchange for sending aid to Ukraine was wretched and short. Negotiators released the text on Sunday, and by Tuesday it was dead.

This says much about about toxic congressional politics econ.st/48gesdg 👇

item.title: 公平是工作场所的隐性货币。它让老板、员工和客户都为之振奋👇。
item.description: Fairness is the hidden currency of the workplace. It animates bosses, employees and customers alike econ.st/3wbtmV7 👇

item.title: 也许所有关于泰勒-斯威夫特和特拉维斯-凯尔斯的报道都是这个媒体时代完美的、自我安慰式的结晶：这是一个伪事件，不是由公关人员设计的，而是由媒体炒作自己创造的👇。
item.description: Maybe all the coverage on Taylor Swift and Travis Kelce is a perfect, self-satirising crystallisation of this media era: a pseudo-pseudo-event, not devised by a publicist but created by media speculation itself econ.st/48bgZp1 👇

item.title: 美国的一些参议员发布了一项边境妥协方案，与共和党人的要求大体一致。但众议院领导层随后拒绝了他们的要求。他们所造成的损害远远超出了美国自己的海岸👇。
item.description: A group of senators in America released a border compromise broadly in line with what Republicans have sought. But House leadership then rejected what they had asked for. The damage they have done goes far beyond America’s own shores econ.st/42uByfb 👇

item.title: 塔克-卡尔森（Tucker Carlson）在采访弗拉基米尔-普京（Vladimir Putin）时做了手脚。但一个重要的信息清晰地响起 👇
item.description: Tucker Carlson fluffed his interview with Vladimir Putin. But a vital message sounded clearly econ.st/3uDqFLj 👇

item.title: 沃洛德梅尔-泽连斯基（Volodymyr Zelensky）解除了备受爱戴的乌克兰武装部队司令的职务。重要的是，这一变动造成的混乱不会削弱乌克兰的作战能力👇。
item.description: Volodymyr Zelensky has dismissed the much-loved commander of Ukraine’s armed forces. It is important that the disruptions caused by this change do not degrade Ukraine’s capacity to fight econ.st/3UGfOe6 👇

item.title:
美国制定银行规则的过程分为许多阶段。通常技术性很强。
但大型银行的老板们似乎对如何实施《巴塞尔协议 III》的建议耿耿于怀。这足以动摇他们的政治立场吗？ 👇
item.description:
America’s process for creating bank rules has many stages. It is normally pretty technical.

But bosses of large banks seem to have taken proposals on how to implement Basel III personally. Will this prove enough to sway their politics? econ.st/3utxtey 👇

item.title: 尽管唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）在 2021 年 1 月 6 日的事件中扮演了重要角色，但科罗拉多州很可能不会被允许将他从选票中删除，其他 49 个州也不会在今年的选举中将他从选票中删除 👇 。
item.description: Despite Donald Trump’s role in the events of January 6th 2021, Colorado will very probably not be allowed to remove him from its ballot, nor will the other 49 states in this year’s election econ.st/3Uw34a9 👇

item.title:
墨西哥总统及其家人否认最近针对他们的一系列指控。
无论如何，安德烈斯-曼努埃尔-洛佩斯-奥夫拉多尔对腐败的管理令人震惊。
item.description:
Mexico’s president and his family deny a recent slew of allegations against them.

Regardless, Andrés Manuel López Obrador’s management of corruption has been appalling econ.st/3uiENd3 👇

item.title:
对许多人来说，拨打客户服务电话等同于坠入地狱深渊。但有些人却能找到真正的联系。
当这种联系不再是人与人之间的联系时，会发生什么呢？
item.description:
For many, calling a customer-service number equates to diving into the depths of hell. But others find moments of genuine connection.

What happens when that connection stops being human? econ.st/3uhfYhu

item.title: 佐科-维多多帮助印尼成为近年来经济表现最好的国家之一。但这一进步是在即将离任的总统独裁本能的影响下取得的，而他心目中的继任者似乎有可能效仿他的独裁本能。
item.description: Joko Widodo has helped make Indonesia one of the best-performing economies in recent years. But this progress has come about in spite of the outgoing president’s authoritarian instincts, which his preferred successor seems likely to emulate econ.st/42AIJSN 👇

item.title:
学生们每天要参加 14 个小时的讲座、研讨会和社交活动。如果有人不参加，你应该问 "你为什么不参加？"
1843》杂志深入了解嘀嗒拼车的房地产活动
item.description:
Students were expected to attend 14 hours of lectures, seminars and social events each day. If someone wasn’t joining in you were supposed to ask “why aren’t you doing that?”

1843 magazine goes inside the TikTok property hustle econ.st/49dZVjF

item.title: 到 2040 年，非洲所需的建筑中约有 70% 尚未建成。非洲大陆如何才能容纳世界上增长最快的人口？ 👇
item.description: About 70% of buildings needed in Africa by 2040 are not yet built. How can the continent house the world’s fastest-growing population? econ.st/4bozv0h 👇

item.title: 日本主要反对党领导人泉健太渴望变革。执政党现在丑闻缠身，理论上，他有一个难得的机会来实现变革👇。
item.description: Izumi Kenta, the leader of Japan’s main opposition party, is itching for change. With the ruling party now beset by scandal, in theory, he has a rare opportunity to get it econ.st/3SOBe7D 👇

item.title: 美国拥有一支横跨全球的军队，而伊朗仍然依赖于登月前的战舰和战斗机。那么，为什么伊朗如此难以恫吓呢？ 👇
item.description: America has a globe-striding army; Iran still relies on warships and fighter jets that predate the Moon landing. Why, then, is Iran so hard to intimidate? econ.st/49slSvg 👇
